channel.title: Probably my last question to this forum
channel.description:
In all my time here, i think i asked about 5 questions... however, none of them ever got answered (fixed all my problems myself) but now i have 1 little little problem and if no-one answers this question... i might as well leave... i joined this forum to get help from people...
added jad... max hp is correct, combat is correct everything is correct except...
the attack and defence level, what levels should i give the JAD?
i mean c'mon it doesn't even have to be 100% accurate... but i want the levels as balanced as possible to make the JAD tough, but not impossible...
CMON! please!!

item.title: Probably my last question to this forum
item.dc:creator: @KraytascapeFTW KraytascapeFTW
item.description:
@KraytascapeFTW wrote:

well i only tested the jad in the cave (scripted spawn)
and command spawn (instanced, only i can see it)

i will put jad @ home for testing

JAD is the problem, sever crashes when players get near

Read full topic
item.source: Probably my last question to this forum

item.title: Probably my last question to this forum
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Was it working before? If so then that is 99.9% the problem.

Read full topic
item.source: Probably my last question to this forum

item.title: Probably my last question to this forum
item.dc:creator: @KraytascapeFTW KraytascapeFTW
item.description:
@KraytascapeFTW wrote:

IDK if its the attack and def stats being over 99… but everytime i enter the fight cave… the server crashes… when i spawn jad outside de fight cave, it’s all goood, but not when it’s in the fight cave

when i go in the fight cave and jad is not there, it’s also all gooood

Read full topic
item.source: Probably my last question to this forum

item.title: Probably my last question to this forum
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

I’d say his attack level and defence level should be split into this:
x = CB level
y = Attack level
z = Defence level
y = (x/2) * (2/3)
z = (x/2) * (1/3)

If this doesn’t work out, sorry, I’m only taking a guess. But it seems like a fair system.

Read full topic
item.source: Probably my last question to this forum
